CodeList.Name: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child Questionnaire Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child test code.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: It is hard to breathe.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report - Hard to Breathe

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: I get sick easily.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report - Get Sick Easily

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: I get sores and/or rashes.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report - Get Sores and/or Rashes

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: My legs hurt.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report - Legs Hurt

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: I feel tired.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report - Feel Tired

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: My back feels stiff.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report - Back Feels Stiff

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: I wake up tired.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report - Wake Up Tired

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: My hands are weak.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report - Hands Are Weak

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: It is hard to use the bathroom.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report - Hard to Use Bathroom

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: It is hard to gain or lose weight when I want to.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report - Hard to Gain or Lose Weight

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: It is hard to use my hands.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report - Hard to Use Hands

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: It is hard to swallow food.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report - Hard to Swallow Food

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: It takes me a long time to bathe or shower.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report - Long Time to Bathe or Shower

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: I get hurt accidentally.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report - Get Hurt Accidentally

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: I take a long time to eat.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report - Take Long Time to Eat

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: It is hard to turn myself during the night.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report - Hard to Turn During Night

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: PQL05-Hard to Go Places With Equipment
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: It is hard for me to go places with my equipment.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report - Hard to Go Places With Equipment

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: It is hard for me to tell the doctors and nurses how I feel.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report - Hard Tell Doctors and Nurses How Feel

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: It is hard for me to ask the doctors and nurses questions.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report - Hard Ask Doctors and Nurses Questions

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: It is hard for me to explain my illness to other people.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report - Hard Explain Illness to People

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: PQL05-Hard for Family to Plan Activities
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: It is hard for my family to plan activities like vacations.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report - Hard for Family to Plan Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: It is hard for my family to get enough rest.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report - Hard for Family to Rest

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: I think money is a problem in our family.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report - Money Problem in Our Family

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: I think my family has a lot of problems.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report - Family Has Lot of Problems

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child - In the past one month, how much of a problem has this been for you: I do not have the equipment I need.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report - Do Not Have Equipment Need

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Child Questionnaire Test Code
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Child Report Test Code Terminology
